name: Orbsorber
description:
Developed by Casevse (@CarlosSevila) for the Ludum Dare 37. Jam Entry.

Theme of the jam: One Room

Jump and bounce off the walls while picking the green orbs. The red orbs are the bad ones.

Cursors / WASD -> Move

Space -> Jump / Start

Esc -> Exit

Thanks for playing.

Ludum Dare 37 entry
